data.name: The Legend of Mythos
data.detailed_description:
Mythos, a mysterious traveler that lost his memories,
the only clue he has about himself is a "Feather" that seems to be contains a mysterious power.
Led by the legend of the feather told in some region, Mythos start to travel wherever he could find a clue about himself.
In the middle of his journey, he meets a lot of inhuman women of legends that will help him to discover more about the world and himself.|


- 5 Heroines that will give you trials
- 20 sex scene and more with some harems
- 30 miniquests to clear
- and don't forget the cute girls
- pregnancy ending


The player must clear the mystery of the legendary feather that is mentioned in this winter village myths.
Which the feather will lead the chosen one into a promised land above the clouds

data.short_description: Mythos, a man of mystery arrives in the mystical winter town. He meets a lot of sexy girls that seem to be inhuman even at the first glance. With the dreams of befriending all the girls in the world. Now, he set forth towards his romance saga.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ 3.20 GHz or Intel Core2 Duo E6850 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 3.20 GHz or Intel Core i5-760 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450 / Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: X 10.13
  • Processor: iMac "Core i3" equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5670
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: still need further confirmation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X Lion
  • Processor: iMac "Core i5" equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5670
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: still need further confirmation

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit sexual content of procreating with mythology monster girls.
All characters depicted are older than 21 years old.
